original_text: The hand of the Lord was upon me, and he brought me out in the Spirit of the Lord and set me down in the middle of the valley; it was full of bones.
korean_text: 여호와께서 권능으로 내게 임재하시고 그의 영으로 나를 데리고 가서 골짜기 가운데 두셨는데 거기 뼈가 가득하더라

sentences.original_text: The hand of the Lord was upon me
and he brought me out in the Spirit of the Lord
and set me down in the middle of the valley
